en.description: Empowered Quiver is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ivara that improves Quiver's Dashwire Arrow and Cloak Arrow. Dashwire Arrow grants critical damage to allies standing on the wire, while Cloak Arrow grants a chance to resist status effects. Both effects scale with power strength.

ru.description: Усиленный Колчан — мод-аугмент для Варфрейма Ивара, изменяющий способность Колчан. Веревочная Стрела увеличивает критический урон союзников стоящих на проводе на 100%, а Маскировочная Стрела дает шанс противостоять эффектам статуса.

ko.description: Empowered Quiver is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ivara that improves Quiver's Dashwire Arrow and Cloak Arrow. Dashwire Arrow grants critical damage to allies standing on the wire, while Cloak Arrow grants a chance to resist status effects. Both effects scale with power strength.
